duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, estimate, and schedule mechanical, electrical, and heavy industrial construction projects.
Support administrative and construction activities, review proposals, specifications, and drawings, perform material takeoffs, and prepare cost estimates.
Supervise subcontractors, communicate with vendors, and prepare work plans to assure quality control and track costs and materials.
Administer safety programs, manage equipment schedules, and maintain exceptional owner relations.
Relocate as required for project assignments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Electrical, Mechanical, or Civil Engineering (Master's preferred) with knowledge of construction safety and current federal & OSHA requirements
